page_content: The page provides an overview of publications related to natural hazards.
The page discusses the planning and management of water bodies.
The page discusses the delay in implementing a harmonized accounting model (HRM2) in the Canton's financial information system (FIS).
The page mentions the approval of a budget for the acquisition and implementation of uniform software for the administration of Bern University of Applied Sciences.
The page mentions the approval of credits for new software for elections and fleet management.
The page offers various publications related to career, study, and vocational guidance.
The page offers tips and guidelines for job interviews.
The page announces the opening of a COVID-19 rapid test center in Belp.
The page provides information on the admission procedure for secondary level II education.
The page discusses the Financial and Burden Equalization Law (FILAG) and its impact on tax burden shifts between the Canton and municipalities.
